summary: GPS may seem like everyday technology, but it depends on military systems that continue to evolve to meet defense needs. The Department of Defense has worked for decades to develop a jam-resistant GPS capability for the military called M-code. This requires satellites to broadcast the M-code signal, control systems on the ground, and equipment that can receive it. Modernized satellites are in space but receiver...
title: GPS Modernization: DOD Continuing to Develop New Jam-Resistant Capability, But Widespread Use Remains Years Away
